trans-unit.source: Provides an API to construct <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbExpression" />s and allows that API to be accessed as extension methods on the expression type itself.
trans-unit.target: 提供 API 來建構 <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbExpression" />，並允許以運算式類型本身的擴充方法來存取該 API。

trans-unit.source: The function that defines the aggregate operation.
trans-unit.target: 定義彙總作業的函式。

trans-unit.source: The argument over which the aggregate function should be calculated.
trans-unit.target: 應該計算其彙總函式的引數。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbFunctionAggregate" />.
trans-unit.target: 建立新的 <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbFunctionAggregate" />。

trans-unit.source: A new function aggregate with a reference to the given function and argument.
trans-unit.target: 含有指定函式及引數之參考的新函式彙總。

trans-unit.source: The function aggregate's Distinct property will have the value <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 函式彙總的 Distinct 屬性會有<see langword="false" />值。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="function" /> or <paramref name="argument" /> null.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="function" /> 或 <paramref name="argument" /> 為 null。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="function" /> is not an aggregate function or has more than one argument, or the result type of <paramref name="argument" /> is not equal or promotable to the parameter type of <paramref name="function" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="function" /> 不是彙總函式，或具有一個以上的引數，或者 <paramref name="argument" /> 的結果類型不等於或不可提升為 <paramref name="function" /> 的參數類型。

trans-unit.source: The function that defines the aggregate operation.

trans-unit.source: The argument over which the aggregate function should be calculated.
trans-unit.target: 應該計算其彙總函式的引數。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbFunctionAggregate" /> that is applied in a distinct fashion.
trans-unit.target: 建立以不同方式套用的新 <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbFunctionAggregate" />。

trans-unit.source: A new function aggregate with a reference to the given function and argument.
trans-unit.target: 含有指定函式及引數之參考的新函式彙總。

trans-unit.source: The function aggregate's Distinct property will have the value <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 函式彙總的 Distinct 屬性會有<see langword="true" />值。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="function" /> or <paramref name="argument" /> is null.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbIsOfExpression" /> expression that determines whether the given argument is of the specified type, and only that type (not a subtype).
trans-unit.target: 建立新的 <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbIsOfExpression" /> 運算式，這個運算式會判斷給定的引數是否為指定型別並且就只為該型別 (而非子型別)。

trans-unit.source: A new DbIsOfExpression with the specified instance and type and DbExpressionKind IsOfOnly.
trans-unit.target: 含有指定之執行個體和型別以及 DbExpressionKind IsOfOnly 的新 DbIsOfExpression。

trans-unit.source: DbIsOfExpression requires that `argument` has a polymorphic result type, and that `type` is a type from the same type hierarchy as that result type.
trans-unit.target: DbIsOfExpression 要求`argument`具有多型結果型別，以及`type`是從相同的型別階層架構，為該結果型別類型。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="argument" /> or <paramref name="type" /> is null.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbExpression" /> that specifies the outer set argument.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbExpression" /> that specifies the inner set argument.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbExpression" />，可指定內部集引數。

trans-unit.source: A method that specifies how the outer key value should be derived from an element of the outer set.
trans-unit.target: 此方法可指定外部索引鍵值該如何自外部集合的項目衍生。

trans-unit.source: A method that specifies how the inner key value should be derived from an element of the inner set.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbJoinExpression" /> that joins the sets specified by the outer and inner expressions, on an equality condition between the specified outer and inner keys, using InnerJoin as the <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbExpressionKind" />.
trans-unit.target: 使用 InnerJoin 作為 <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbExpressionKind" />，建立新的 <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbJoinExpression" />，其會以指定的內外部索引鍵間的相等條件，來結合內外部運算式所指定的集合。

trans-unit.source: A new DbJoinExpression, with an <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbExpressionKind" /> of InnerJoin, that represents the inner join operation applied to the left and right input sets under a join condition that compares the outer and inner key values for equality.
trans-unit.target: 新的 DbJoinExpression，含有 InnerJoin 的<see cref="T:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbExpressionKind" />，表示套用至聯結條件下左右方輸入集的內部聯結作業，其中該聯結條件會比較外部和內部索引鍵值是否相等。

trans-unit.source: The expression produced by <paramref name="outerKey" /> or <paramref name="innerKey" /> is null.

trans-unit.source: The expressions produced by <paramref name="outerKey" /> and <paramref name="innerKey" /> are not comparable for equality.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="outerKey" /> 和 <paramref name="innerKey" /> 所產生的運算式無法比較是否相等。

trans-unit.source: The type of the <c>selector</c>.

trans-unit.source: A method that specifies how the outer key value should be derived from an element of the outer set.

trans-unit.source: A method that specifies how the inner key value should be derived from an element of the inner set.

trans-unit.source: A method that specifies how an element of the result set should be derived from elements of the inner and outer sets.
trans-unit.target: 此方法指定結果集的項目該如何自內外部集合的項目衍生。

trans-unit.source: This method must produce an instance of a type that is compatible with Join and can be resolved into a <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbExpression" />.
trans-unit.target: 此方法所產生的執行個體類型必須與聯結相容，且可解析為 <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbExpression" />。

trans-unit.source: Compatibility requirements for <c>TSelector</c> are described in remarks.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbProjectExpression" /> that projects the specified selector over the sets specified by the outer and inner expressions, joined on an equality condition between the specified outer and inner keys, using InnerJoin as the <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbExpressionKind" />.
trans-unit.target: 使用 InnerJoin 作為 <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbExpressionKind" />，建立新的 <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbProjectExpression" />，其會將指定的選擇器投射在內外部運算式所指定的集合，這裡的內外部運算式是依據指定內外部索引鍵間的相等條件而聯結。

trans-unit.source: A new DbProjectExpression with the specified selector as its projection, and a new DbJoinExpression as its input.
trans-unit.target: 新的 DbProjectExpression，將指定的選取器作為其投影，並將新的 DbJoinExpression 作為其輸入。

trans-unit.source: The input DbJoinExpression is created with an <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbExpressionKind" /> of InnerJoin, that represents the inner join operation applied to the left and right input sets under a join condition that compares the outer and inner key values for equality.
trans-unit.target: 輸入 DbJoinExpression 是透過 InnerJoin 的 <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbExpressionKind" /> 所建立，表示套用至聯結條件下左右方輸入集的內部聯結作業，其中該聯結條件會比較外部和內部索引鍵值是否相等。

trans-unit.source: To be compatible with Join, `TSelector` must be derived from <xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbExpression>, or must be an anonymous type with DbExpression-derived properties.

trans-unit.source: Metadata for the property that represents the end of the relationship to which navigation should occur.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbRelationshipNavigationExpression" /> representing the navigation of a composition or association relationship.

trans-unit.source: A new DbRelationshipNavigationExpression representing the navigation of the specified from and to relation ends of the specified relation type from the specified navigation source instance.
trans-unit.target: 新的 DbRelationshipNavigationExpression，表示與指定巡覽來源執行個體間指定之關聯類型的指定往返關聯性端巡覽。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbRelationshipNavigationExpression> requires that navigation always occur from a reference, and so `navigateFrom` must always have a reference result type.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbRelationshipNavigationExpression> 需要瀏覽一定會發生的參考，因此`navigateFrom`永遠必須參考結果型別。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="fromEnd" />, <paramref name="toEnd" /> or <paramref name="navigateFrom" /> is null.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="fromEnd" /> and <paramref name="toEnd" /> are not declared by the same relationship type, or <paramref name="navigateFrom" /> has a result type that is not compatible with the property type of <paramref name="fromEnd" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="fromEnd" /> 和 <paramref name="toEnd" /> 不是由相同的關聯性類型宣告，或者 <paramref name="navigateFrom" /> 具有不與屬性類型 <paramref name="fromEnd" /> 相容的結果類型。

trans-unit.target: 關聯型別（其代表應該在此發生巡覽的關聯性結尾）的屬性的名稱。

trans-unit.source: An expression the specifies the instance from which naviagtion should occur.
trans-unit.target: 運算式，指定要對其進行巡覽的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbRelationshipNavigationExpression" /> representing the navigation of a composition or association relationship.
trans-unit.target: 建立新的 <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbRelationshipNavigationExpression" />，表示複合或關聯性 (Association Relationship) 的巡覽。

trans-unit.source: A new DbRelationshipNavigationExpression representing the navigation of the specified from and to relation ends of the specified relation type from the specified navigation source instance.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbRelationshipNavigationExpression> requires that navigation always occur from a reference, and so `navigateFrom` must always have a reference result type.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbRelationshipNavigationExpression> 需要瀏覽一定會發生的參考，因此`navigateFrom`永遠必須參考結果型別。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="type" />, <paramref name="fromEndName" />, <paramref name="toEndName" /> or <paramref name="navigateFrom" /> is null.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="type" />、<paramref name="fromEndName" />、<paramref name="toEndName" /> 或 <paramref name="navigateFrom" /> 為 null。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="type" /> is not associated with this command tree's metadata workspace or <paramref name="navigateFrom" /> is associated with a different command tree, or <paramref name="type" /> does not declare a relation end property with name <paramref name="toEndName" /> or <paramref name="fromEndName" />, or <paramref name="navigateFrom" /> has a result type that is not compatible with the property type of the relation end property with name <paramref name="fromEndName" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="type" /> 不與此命令樹狀目錄的中繼資料工作區相關聯，或者 <paramref name="navigateFrom" /> 與不同的命令樹狀目錄相關聯，或者 <paramref name="type" /> 未宣告名稱為 <paramref name="toEndName" /> 或 <paramref name="fromEndName" /> 的關聯性端屬性，或者 <paramref name="navigateFrom" /> 有不與名稱為 <paramref name="fromEndName" /> 的關聯性端屬性的屬性類型相容的結果類型。

trans-unit.source: An expression that specifies the argument.
trans-unit.target: 指定引數的運算式。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbNewInstanceExpression" />.
trans-unit.target: 建立新的 <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbNewInstanceExpression" />。

trans-unit.source: The type of the new instance.
trans-unit.target: 新執行個體的型別。

trans-unit.source: Expressions that specify values of the new instances, interpreted according to the instance's type.
trans-unit.target: 根據執行個體型別進行解譯以指定新執行個體值的運算式。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbNewInstanceExpression" />.
trans-unit.target: 建立新的 <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbNewInstanceExpression" />。

trans-unit.source: If the type argument is a collection type, the arguments specify the elements of the collection.
trans-unit.target: 如果型別引數是集合型別，則這些引數會用於指定集合的項目。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise the arguments are used as property or column values in the new instance.
trans-unit.target: 否則，這些引數會用來做為新執行個體中的屬性或資料行值。

trans-unit.source: A new DbNewInstanceExpression with the specified type and arguments.
trans-unit.target: 含有指定之型別及引數的新 DbNewInstanceExpression。

trans-unit.source: If `instanceType` is a collection type then every expression in `arguments` must have a result type that is promotable to the element type of the `instanceType`.
trans-unit.target: 如果`instanceType`是集合型別，則在每個運算式`arguments`必須可提升為的項目類型的結果型別`instanceType`。

trans-unit.source: If `instanceType` is a row type, `arguments` must contain as many expressions as there are columns in the row type, and the result type of each expression must be equal or promotable to the type of the corresponding column.
trans-unit.target: 如果`instanceType`是資料列型別，`arguments`必須包含數量的運算式，因為有資料行中的資料列類型，而且每個運算式的結果類型必須等於或可提升到對應的資料行的類型。

trans-unit.source: A row type that does not declare any columns is invalid.
trans-unit.target: 未宣告任何資料行資料列型別無效。

trans-unit.source: If `instanceType` is an entity type, `arguments` must contain as many expressions as there are properties defined by the type, and the result type of each expression must be equal or promotable to the type of the corresponding property.
trans-unit.target: 如果`instanceType`是實體類型、`arguments`必須包含有許多運算式類型所定義的屬性，以及每個運算式的結果類型必須是等於或可提升對應屬性的型別。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="instanceType" /> or <paramref name="arguments" /> is null, or <paramref name="arguments" /> contains null.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="instanceType" /> 或 <paramref name="arguments" /> 為 null，或是 <paramref name="arguments" /> 包含 null。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="arguments" /> is empty or the result types of the contained expressions do not match the requirements of <paramref name="instanceType" /> (as explained in the remarks section).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="arguments" /> 是空的或內含的運算式的結果類型不符合 <paramref name="instanceType" /> 的需求 (如＜備註＞一節中所說明)。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbApplyExpression" /> that evaluates the given <paramref name="apply" /> expression once for each element of a given input set, producing a collection of rows with corresponding input and apply columns.
